member.name: MF_MEDIA_ENGINE_FRAME_PROTECTION_FLAGS
member.summary: Specifies the content protection requirements for a video frame.

member.name: MF_MEDIA_ENGINE_FRAME_PROTECTION_FLAGS.MF_MEDIA_ENGINE_FRAME_PROTECTION_FLAG_PROTECTED
member.summary: The video frame should be protected.

member.name: MF_MEDIA_ENGINE_FRAME_PROTECTION_FLAGS.MF_MEDIA_ENGINE_FRAME_PROTECTION_FLAG_REQUIRES_SURFACE_PROTECTION
member.summary: Direct3D surface protection must be applied to any surface that contains the frame.

member.name: MF_MEDIA_ENGINE_FRAME_PROTECTION_FLAGS.MF_MEDIA_ENGINE_FRAME_PROTECTION_FLAG_REQUIRES_ANTI_SCREEN_SCRAPE_PROTECTION
member.summary: Direct3D anti-screen-scrape protection must be applied to any surface that contains the frame.
